text: There was a lion who was not angry, cruel, or violent, but treatable and just like a good creature, so he became king. Under his reign, a general meeting of animals was held to apologize and receive mutual satisfaction: the wolf gave peace to the lamb, the panther to the camel, the tiger to the deer, the fox to the hare, etc. And the timid hare said, I longed to see this day come, that the weak might be given justice to the strong. And he immediately ran as best he could. When justice is done, the humble can live quietly... but not be held back.
title: El buen rey león
author: nan Esopo
